mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gym (email, gym_name, password, phone_number, address_code, address_detail, user_type) VALUES (#{email}, #{gymName}, #{password}, #{phoneNumber}, #{addressCode}, #{addressDetail}, #{userType})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM gym WHERE email=#{email}) AS success;
SELECT id, email, gym_name, password, phone_number, address_code, address_detail, user_type FROM gym WHERE email=#{email} AND password=#{password}
